alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 2:30PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong shower will impact portions of south central Columbus and southeastern Horry Counties through 300 PM EST... At 229 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong shower near Hickory Grove, or 9 miles northeast of Conway, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, Surfside Beach, Myrtle Beach Airport, Socastee, Red Hill, Springmaid Pier, Garden City, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Loris, Bethel, Hickory Grove, Horry Georgetown Technical College Conway Campus, Nakina, Bughill, Nixonville, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, Bucksport, Wampee and Williams. This includes the following highways... SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 24. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 11 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Northern Horry
